1.content:
Wonder Woman, Supergirl, & Batgirl have some weird adventures when they get reduced in size to doll size.
Unfortunately at that size they lose control of what happens to them. They have to contend with now giant cats and dogs and everyday items.
They may be put in cages, doll houses, etc.
They also have to try and keep their costumes on by naughty guys who want to pull them off.

They may get shrunken by shrink rays, shrinking formulas, etc.

Now let’s get started at having some fun with these choices...
1.title: Shrinking women only please

11.content:
Bob smiled as he unwrapped the package he had eagerly been waiting for. He had jumped at the chance to order this amazing item when he saw the advertisement on the internet.
It was a shrink ray gun. Much like those seen in sci-fi movies.

But this one was a real shrinking ray gun. Supposed to shrink anything or anybody to miniature size in seconds.

As he pulled it from the package , he marveled at sight. It looked much like a toy gun. It was black and about 6 inches long. The gun was very light. On the side was a digital dial with arrows pointing one up and one down.

There was a precharged battery pack ready to be inserted into the pistol grip. On the side of the pistol was a sticker which read “ never point unless you intend to shrink something “. Also was a setting which read “ permanent or temporary shrink”. Temporary was for 24 hours.

Setting the dial to temporary and the size to 25%, Bob looked around the room for something to try it on. Not seeing anything he looked outside. Hanging on the front porch was a bird feeder with birds feeding.

That would do. He aimed at a bird feeding and pulled the trigger. Instantly a white narrow beam hit the bird and it began to shrink.
The bird stopped feeding and before it could fly was reduced in size to that of a dragonfly!

Now Bob....
11.title: Wonder Woman

111.content:
“Great, it works!” Bob thought, “ now to try it on something else or somebody”.
As he was pondering what to try it on next, his eyes came upon a local newspaper article about Wonder Woman and how she had broken up a local crime syndicate.

“Wow, I wonder if this would work on her? Only one way to find out”
With that thought Bob decided on a way to lure her into a trap.

What kind of trap does Bob decide?
111.title: Does this

1111.content:
Word had gotten around that another crime syndicate had moved into the area. Diana Prince had intercepted an email telling of a possible heist going on at a hidden warehouse in the secluded part of the countryside. The object was a large stone statue that was
being kept for a overseas buyer.

“Hmmm, Diana said, “ perhaps Wonder Woman should pay a visit.
Won’t they be surprised when Wonder Woman puts a stop to their plans!”

The email detailed the time and other things. It was to be tonight.

Later that night...
1111.title: Trap #1

11111.content:
Wonder Woman had arrived well in advance of the email timeframe.
It was a large warehouse but no one seemed to be around. No cars and no one around. She crept around to check doors but all were locked. Finally she decided to jump on the roof. It was about 25 feet high but she managed it easily.

She walked around but nothing was amiss, all was quiet. Suddenly she did see a lit inner area of the plant, which could only be seen from the roof.
It was an arena with several dogs running around, no wait, she looked closer, they were miniature horses!
She had never seen horses so small. Seeing no one around her curiosity got the best of her and she jumped down to see them closer.

What happens next?
11111.title: This happens

info.description:
Adult theme shrinking of Wonder Woman, Supergirl & Bat Girl. More DC superheroines may be added later.
If you are bothered by Superheroines being shrunken in mature adventures, please leave.
All these characters are wholly owned by DC comics.
